alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 10 at 1:27AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon, Northern Big Horn, Southern Big Horn, and Treasure. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Persons should consider delaying travel if possible. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution and be prepared for sudden changes in visibility. Make sure your car is winterized and in good working order.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Treasure
